import React, {createRef} from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' const CategoryFilter = ({Filter}) => { console.log(Filter) const ref = [] const txtToPrint = [] const txtRepeater = () =>{ Filter.forEach( (filter, index ) => { ref.push(createRef()) let txtLi = [] filter.options.forEach((option, index)=>{ txtLi.push(
  • {option}
    • ) }) txtToPrint.push(

    {filter.category}

      {txtLi}
    ) }); } txtRepeater() console.log(ref, txtToPrint) return(

    BUSCAR TAMBIEN POR

    LUGAR

    • EN LA ZONA
    • EN EL PAIS
    • CUALQUIER PARTE

    POPULARIDAD

    • ALTA
    • MEDIA
    • BAJA

    PRECIO

    • 0 - 100 $
    • 101 - 500 $
    • 501 - 1000$
    • 1001 - 5000$
    • MAYOR A 5000$
    ) } const mapStateToProps = state =>({ Filter : state.FilterReducer }) export default connect(mapStateToProps,{})(CategoryFilter)
